meanings.sent1: She restarts the game after losing.
meanings.sent2: He always restarts his computer when it freezes.
meanings.sent3: The cat restarts its chase after the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: Like a phoenix, she restarts her life from the ashes of failure.
meanings.sent5: The sun restarts its journey across the sky each day.

meanings.sent1: He restarts the puzzle to solve it faster.
meanings.sent2: After the power outage, she restarts the generator.
meanings.sent3: The child restarts the game level to beat his high score.
meanings.sent4: Just like a clock, time restarts its ticking after a pause.
meanings.sent5: The river restarts its flow after the dam is opened.

meanings.sent1: Every morning is a restart for a new day.
meanings.sent2: After the setback, they decided to have a restart in their project.
meanings.sent3: The restart of the movie made everyone laugh at the mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The restart of the relationship felt like a fresh breeze in spring.
meanings.sent5: The restart of the race gave everyone a chance to catch up.
